item.title: Stefan add a quote by Carolyn Zeisset
item.description: "creativity results from a restlessness to improve the status quo and involves generation of new ideas, use of the imagination, and decision making." -- Carolyn Zeisset

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Adrian McEwen
item.description: "How to choose the right platform for your Internet of Things device is as easy a question to answer as working out the meaning of life." -- Adrian McEwen

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Adrian McEwen
item.description: "your first idea is unlikely to be the best, so you should be optimising for speed of iteration rather than quality of prototype." -- Adrian McEwen

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Duane E. Knapp
item.description: "Whenever you see a successful business, someone once made a courageous decision. —Peter Drucker," -- Duane E. Knapp

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Cal Newport
item.description: "If you want to love what you do, abandon the passion mindset (“what can the world offer me?”) and instead adopt the craftsman mindset (“what can I offer the world?”)." -- Cal Newport

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Lars Kolind
item.description: "What rules could we get rid of today that would enhance our ability to create value?" -- Lars Kolind

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Cal Newport
item.description: "Giving people more control over what they do and how they do it increases their happiness, engagement, and sense of fulfillment." -- Cal Newport

item.title: Stefan add a quote by Lars Kolind
item.description: "It’s a mathematical fact that if the average number of relationships between people in an organisation increases by 20%, then value generation in the organisation increases by approximately 40%." -- Lars Kolind
